rukus.text: Ni shuo:“Renmen a! Jiaru nimen huaiyi wo de zongjiao [zhu][yisilan jiao], name,[nimen dang zhidao] wo jue bu hui chongbai nimen she an la er chongbai de ouxiang, er wo zhi hui chongbai an la, ta neng shi nimen siwang. Wo yi fengming zuo xinshi.
[Wo hai fengming]: Ni [mu sheng] dang qiancheng chedi qingxiang zhengjiao [yisilan jiao], ni jue buyao zuo bai ouxiang zhe,
ni jue buyao she an la er qiqiu dui ni ji wuyi ye wu hai de [ouxiang]. Jiaru ni zheyang zuo, ni bi shi bu yi zhe.”

Jiaru an la shi ni zaoyu buxing, name, chu ta wai, jue meiyou ren neng jiechu; jiaru ta yu ci fu ni, name, jue meiyou ren neng zuzhi ta de enhui. Ta ba enhui ciyu tasuo yiyu de puren. Ta shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Renmen a! Zhenli [mu sheng he “gulanjing”] que yi cong nimen de zhu jianglin nimen. Shei zunxing zhengdao [zhenli], shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru qitu, shei zi shou qi hai. Wo bushi nimen de jianhu zhe.”
Ni dang zunxing ni suo feng dao de qishi [“gulanjing”], dang jianren, zhidao an la zuo chu panjue. Ta shi zui hao de panjue zhe.
